Metadata: California Sea Grant College Program: An Overview 1977-1978
University of California Sea Grant College Program, Institute of Marine Resources
program reports (annual, progress, planning reports, etc)
IMR Reference Number 79-102; Sea Grant Publication Number 68

This overview of the 1977-78 California Sea Grant Program addresses three themes that are among the foremost issues facing society today: ecology, technology, and cooperation. The scientific investigations reported range from the broadly fundamental to the sharply practical. The educational and advisory efforts described are critical to developing a com mon understanding of the potential of the ocean and the implications of developing that potential.
